title: Herbal Acne Serum (Tea Tree + Neem)
excerpt: A targeted anti-acne serum combining diluted tea tree oil, neem infusion, and aloe to soothe breakouts and reduce inflammation.
content:
## What Is This Acne Serum?
A concentrated yet gentle herbal serum formulated for active breakouts. Features diluted tea tree oil, neem oil infusion, and aloe vera for soothing hydration.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Tea tree and neem are natural antimicrobial agents ideal for Pitta-related acne and inflammation. Aloe cools and restores balance.

### Key Benefits
- Helps reduce active acne and redness.
- Clarifies congested skin.
- Provides cooling, soothing relief.

## Ingredients
- Diluted tea tree essential oil (safe concentration)
- Neem oil infusion
- Aloe vera extract

## Usage Instructions
- Apply sparingly to affected areas.
- Use 1â€“2 times daily after cleansing.

## Packaging
- Amber dropper bottle for precision.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test first. Avoid contact with eyes. Consult dermatologist for cystic or severe acne.

## Why Choose This Serum?
A clean, potent Ayurvedic blend tailored for breakout-prone skin without harsh chemicals.
